duties_responsibilities.duty: Set up and operate small to large-scale audiovisual systems in a hospitality environment ensuring complete customer satisfaction.
Troubleshoot technical issues and resolve problems quickly as they arise.
Provide excellent service and strive to exceed the expectations and needs of internal and external customers.
Understand the technical aspects of the job and demonstrate advanced operational ability to troubleshoot and problem solve with equipment and software issues.
Understand company processes, follow procedures, complete systems entry and paperwork accurately, and utilize floor up-selling techniques to increase revenue.
Work with clients to finalize invoices and interact with other staff and outside vendors for equipment.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma required, Associate’s degree preferred. Technical 1-Star Certification required.
